---
category: news
title: "Rapidus to focus on specialized AI chips and not compete with TSMC"
excerpt: "Rapidus, a Japanese company building a semiconductor factory in Chitose City, Hokkaido, Japan, said the construction progress is going smoothly despite the tight schedule. The company also said that its strategy for developing the most advanced chips will not overlap with existing major manufacturers such as TSMC and will focus on developing specialized chips for AI."
